DOC.brief_summary: Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital conduct research study evaluate effectiveness brain-training product , MUSE , EEG-guided neurofeedback device design assist cultivate relaxed , attentive state mind meditation . The investigator study aim evaluate whether tool could useful treat persistent traumatic brain injury symptom inattention , impulsivity , irritability , dysregulated mood .
DOC.brief_title: Neurofeedback-enhanced Mindfulness Meditation Traumatic Brain Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty subject total participate study . Subjects randomize focused-attention meditation training without neurofeedback device , MUSE . Subjects ask practice ~10 min daily meditation 6-8 week . Neuropsychological testing perform begin study six week train . At time point , randomize non-MUSE group give device ask train additional two week . At conclusion study , subject also undergo brief telephone in-person exit interview regard experience use MUSE device . Primary endpoint : change Neurobehavioral Symptom Inventory Secondary endpoint : change follow : Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale-IV Digit Span Symbol-Digit Coding , Trail-Making Test , Beck Anxiety Inventory , Beck Depression Inventory , Cognitive Affective Mindfulness Scale-Revised , percentage EEG activity associate alpha , beta , theta activity .
